WorkItem.Description:
Styles that set the Visibility of a ColumnDataPoint do not work since the Visibility will be set in the ColumnSeries UpdateDataPoint method and local values have a higher priority than Styles on DependencyProperties.
Â 
The exact spot is in ColumnSeries.cs Line 113 (Release Version in Changeset 40156 ) - seems to work just fine if uncommented.
WorkItem.Summary: ColumnSeries sets Visibility of DataPoint locally so Styles can not modify it anymore
